body:
```
(No text was entered with this change)
```

Original issue reported on code.google.com by `psiinon` on 2015-05-15 16:13:02
@davewichers do you want it remembered in both cases?

Yes. I like the remember feature and would like it to be consistent in both
situations. I.e., it DOES remember across close/reopen.

On Mon, Jan 8, 2018 at 8:58 AM, kingthorin <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @davewichers <https://github.com/davewichers> do you want it remembered
> in both cases?

This is a bug, the view state should be being already saved :/

issue.title: Save configurations after extensions' shutdown

repository.name: zaproxy
repository.description: The ZAP by Checkmarx Core project

issue.body:
Change Control to save the configurations after stopping/destroying the
extensions, not before, to ensure the changes done by the extensions
during shutdown are also saved.

Fix #1642 - Change of view type in Break tab not saved when ZAP closed/
reopened.

body: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
